chunks.text: If I give it height, I will give it height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will say that if I keep its height 230, then its aspect ratio will be decreased.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, it will be stretched a little.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Because it has made its width 230 and its height 230.

chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.text: Now, if you want its height to be 230 and its width to be automatically adjusted.

chunks.text: Now, remove the width one.

chunks.text: So, its height will be 230 pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And it took it in height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, what happens is that width and height can be adjusted through CSS.

chunks.text: And we will see in the CSS section that why we should always set this width and height.

chunks.text: We should always set the width and height from one thing.

chunks.text: Such that when our page is loading, then the image inside our page will not come to the page.

chunks.text: I will tell you in the coming videos.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But now you understand that these width and height attributes.

chunks.text: For now, you understand that width gives the image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Height gives the image.

chunks.text: If one of them is set, then the other one is automatically set.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And these values are in pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And you don't have to write PX or pixel.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You just have to write this number.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And that's it.

chunks.text: This is an attribute, height.

chunks.text: And there is an SRC attribute and an alt attribute.

chunks.text: You can also use style attribute in this.

chunks.text: In fact, you can use style attribute with almost all tags.

chunks.text: So this was about the image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now there are row span and call span attributes.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now you see here that row span means how many rows will be spanned by your td.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: For example, let's say I write here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I want sam and programmer.

chunks.text: Earlier they were taking one cell.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Sam was taking one cell.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Programmer was taking one cell.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I want to write sam in two cells.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So I don't want to write programmer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I just want to write sam.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And I want to write here that call span is equal to 2.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So call span is equal to 2 means that sam will now take the place of two columns.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What does it mean?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Sam will now take the place of two columns.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: That means sam will look like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I'll show you.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So it took the place of the whole column.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So the call span means how many columns will be surrounded.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: By default, only one cell will be surrounded.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But sometimes one cell will be surrounded by two columns.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: To demonstrate this, I'll explain it to you in Excel.

chunks.text: In Excel, you can think of it as a table of our HTML.

chunks.text: Sometimes I want two columns to be spanned by one data.

chunks.text: And here let's say I write sam.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.text: There we use row span.

chunks.text: And with whom we'll use row span?

chunks.text: We'll use row span with td obviously.
